safetyTips: We are following all the safety measures that the Government has advised. We are a Covid Secure Restaurant.
name: KOYLA MERSHAM
address: The Courtyard, Mersham Le Hatch, Hythe Road. TN25 6NH.
description: Koyla Mersham By Shanker Pandey is a Nepalese Restaurant. We are open 6 days of week Tuesday to Sunday from 5 pm to 9 pm. We are providing Takeaway service for Collection and Home delivery within a 4 mile radius. We are serving Mersham, Aldington, Smeeth, Sellinge, Brabourne, Brook, Wye and the Ashford area. For more information please visit www.koylakent.co.uk
